rules_text:
When Inhibition Cleric enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to Inhibition Cleric’s toughness and you gain that much life.
Reborn 2–{4}{W}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
